explains: n. 照料，护理；小心，谨慎；忧虑，烦恼；收养，监护
v. 照顾，照料；在意，担忧；喜欢，想要
wordGroup: take care 注意；小心
take care of 照顾；注意；抚养
care of 由…转交
health care 卫生保健
take care of oneself 照顾自己；颐养
care about v. 担心，关心
care for 关心，照顾；喜欢
medical care 医疗护理
don't care 不管，不在意
nursing care 护理
skin care 护肤品；皮肤护理
take good care 好好照顾；珍重
take good care of 照顾好；好好照看
with care 小心地
personal care 个人护理；个人护理用品
health care products 保健品
child care 儿童保育
health care system 保健系统；医疗制度
intensive care 重病特别护理
take care of yourself 照顾好你自己；自己多保重

sentences.en: She chose her words with care.
I don't care what he thinks.
Would you care for another drink?
